title: give us platinum is looking for player asap
body:
Hey guys have you always wanted to become a great league of legends player! Well now you can with Bluesquare gaming teams. The Team im putting together at the moment is:
Give us Platinum.

We will take anyone doesn't matter wich rank you are in as long as you believe you can win.
we are looking for a 
ADC 
MID
SUP - Secondary

As soon as the team is ranked we will be starting tournaments.

If you have any questions. Or want to apply for the team please let the team managers/captains/leaders: LUD Bluesquare 
in game and we will answer as many questions as quickly as we can

replies.body: I main Support, i pray da {{champion:432}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:89}}
sorry mate we will have u in mind but we think we got a few supports thanks anyway
I main adc, my played are {{champion:236}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:18}}
cool add me in game and we trial

Yeah, I'll trial for the secondary support. Can play all supports with proficiency but am best at: {{champion:201}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:16}}
hello i have invited u as a friend in game so you can trial  for the team
